metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19205 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Roundcube before 1.3.7 mishandles GnuPG MDC integrity-protection warnings, which makes it easier for attackers to obtain sensitive information, a related issue to CVE-2017-17688. This is associated with plugins/enigma/lib/enigma_driver_gnupg.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.3+dfsg.1-1').
